attributes.action: Romanians are not gypsies and not invading - stop the negative campaign
attributes.additional_details:
There is a massive media campaign against Romanians, all estimating that we will invade Britain, we are gypsies, almost everyday UKIP and dailymail is posting a negative article about us, which will led to discrimination and racism towards the innocent. Where are the articles about doctors, lecturers, engineers, cleaners, waitresses, Au pairs, who serve well Britain and are highly appreciated by neighbours, colleagues and employees?

The Romanians are decent and proud people, value their status within the society, many of them are highly skilled and serving well Britain.

We ask the media and the government to provide an overarching picture of who we are!
